physical_appearance:The image shows a pair of squeegees enclosed in a transparent plastic packaging. The squeegees are white in colour with green tips at their bottoms. At the top and front of the plastic packaging
 the words \u0027photo accessory\u0027 and \u0027Konica Trading Corporation Japan\u0027 are displayed. The packaging looks crumpled.

sgcool_label_text:Squeegees are used in handling photographic films during film processing. This pair of unused squeegees are part of the darkroom photography equipment that was previously used by The Picture Farm
 which was set up by the renowned photographer Willie Tang.
